examples.text: Mr. <w>Redfield</w> has been managing the company for over twenty years.
We invited the <w>Redfield</w> family to dinner next Saturday.

senses.sense_definition: A place name used for several cities and towns in the United States, notably in South Dakota, Arkansas, and Iowa.

examples.text: They stopped in <w>Redfield</w> to refuel during their road trip across the Midwest.
The small town of <w>Redfield</w> is known for its historic railway station.

senses.sense_definition: A neighborhood in the city of Bristol, England.

examples.text: She rents a small apartment in <w>Redfield</w>, just east of the city center.
The bus to <w>Redfield</w> was delayed due to heavy traffic.
